snippet: Neymar made the three-man Ballon d’Or shortlist for the first time alongside his Barcelona teammate Lionel Messi and Real Madrid’s Cristiano Ronaldo.
abstract: Barcelona's Neymar makes his first appearance on three-man Ballon d’Or shortlist, alongside teammate Lionel Messi and Real Madrid’s Cristiano Ronaldo; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Neymar made the three-man Ballon d’Or shortlist for the first time alongside his Barcelona teammate Lionel Messi and Real Madrid’s Cristiano Ronaldo.

headline.main: Neymar Is New Name on Ballon d’Or List
headline.print_headline: New Name on Ballon d’Or List
